doc.field: Yoshio Kishi and Irene Yah-Ling Sun Collection
Yoshio Kishi and Irene Yah-Ling Sun Collection
Series IV: Hollywood Films, Television, Theater, and Actors
Series IV: Hollywood Films, Television, Theater, and Actors

This series contains periodicals, clippings, photocopied articles, photos, movie posters, film stills, headshots, and promotional material for Asian American actors, and for films and theater with Asian American themes or characters.
